title: Interpretation of dust in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: We present to you the interpretation of dust in a dream and its meaning in detail. Dust occurs as a result of dust-laden winds, which cause blurred vision and may require closing the eyes to keep them away. They may also cause suffocation and difficulty breathing. We may find dust in the house if the furniture is left for a long time without cleaning and it accumulates on surfaces, so it is truly annoying and seeing it in a dream is a worry. Despite its meaning, this dream has many different interpretations. We will review for you in the encyclopedia. The interpretation of dust in a dream. The interpretation of seeing dust in a dream by Ibn Sirin. There are many interpretations of this dream that differ depending on the situation. If the dreamer sees that he is eating dirt, this vision is unpleasant and indicates the loss of a family member. Seeing him walking on the dirt means that the dreamer will get A lot of money without effort or fatigue. If the dreamer sees that he is cleaning the dirt from his clothes, then this vision is repulsive and indicates disagreements between him and his wife, and this vision shows his illness, and God knows best. Seeing him cleaning the house of dirt, indicates that the dreamer is suffering in his life. From many worries and sorrows. Interpretation of dust in a dream according to Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi narrates that if a person dreams that he is digging dirt from his hole for the sake of the earth, then this vision is evidence of abundant sustenance, and this vision may indicate the acquisition of money. If the dreamer sees that he is throwing dirt on his head, then this dream shows sorrows And the worries that he suffers from in reality, and God knows best. In the event that you see the sky raining dust, this vision shows good conditions for the pioneer. If the dreamer sees that he is collecting dirt from his house, this vision is an indication that he will receive money from his wife. Among the interpretations that Al-Nabulsi mentions Regarding seeing dust in a dream, if the dreamer sees that he is shaking off his clothes, then this vision is undesirable and indicates the loss of money, as it is a symbol of humiliation. If the merchant sees that he is removing dirt from his place, then this vision is evidence that the location of this store has actually changed, and God knows best. In If you see wet soil, then this vision is an indication of the difficulties and problems that the dreamer faces in his life. If the dreamer sees dirt on his face, then this vision is a sign that he will be exposed to family problems. Dust in a single woman’s dreamIn the case of a single woman, seeing dust in a dream is generally It bodes well, and this vision may indicate the dreamer’s success, ambition, and efforts to achieve her goals on the ground. Seeing an unmarried woman walking in the dirt indicates a new job opportunity in reality, and God knows best. If an unmarried woman sees that dirt is stuck to her clothes, then this dream is an indication that a date is approaching. Marriage, and God knows best. As for a single woman who sees that she is cleaning her house of dirt, this vision is undesirable and indicates a failure to achieve a goal on the ground. Dust in a dream for a married woman. As for a married woman, seeing dust in her dream is a good vision for her, and this vision may indicate However, she will get a lot of money. If she sees that she is cleaning her house from dirt, then this dream indicates the presence of disagreements between her.

title: Interpretation of seeing Surah Yasin in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Surah Yasin in a dream via the vision website roy2a.com. Seeing Surah Yasin in a dream has many good connotations. Interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of Surat Yassin in a dream, according to the condition and circumstances of the seer, and whether he was a man or a single woman, married or pregnant, and today through the Vision website we will discuss the interpretation of seeing Surat Yassin in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of senior interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing Surat Yassin in a dream for Ibn Sirin? Seeing or hearing Surat Yassin in a dream indicates a lot of good and abundant sustenance and blessings for the seer. Seeing Surat Yassin in a dream indicates that the seer is a righteous and pious person who loves God and His Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. See also: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing Surat Yassin in Al-Osaimi’s dream? Seeing an unmarried woman reading Surat Yassin in a dream shows that she is far and immune to any evil or misfortune in her life. Seeing a married woman reading Surat Yassin in a dream shows that she is a good and kind woman who always obeys her husband. Seeing the old Surat Yassin in a dream indicates good morals in the afterlife, and God knows best. Seeing Completion of Surah Yasin in a dream It shows that the dreamer has reached his goal that he has been striving for for a long time. See also: Interpretation of seeing Surah Al-Kahf in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing Surah Yasin in a dream for Al-Nabulsi? Seeing Surah Yasin in a dream It indicates a good end in the Hereafter and God knows best. Seeing or hearing Surah Yasin in a dream It shows that the dreamer follows the path of God in his life. Seeing Surah Yasin in a dream It indicates the emergence of promising things in the dreamer's life. Seeing Surah Yasin in a dream It also indicates that the dreamer is a pious and religious person who does a lot of good in his life. What is the interpretation of seeing Surah Yasin in a dream for an unmarried woman? Seeing Surah Yasin in a dream for an unmarried woman It indicates her protection from all evil and misfortune in her life. Seeing an unmarried woman reading Surah Yasin in a dream It indicates that she is a righteous and religious girl who follows the path of God in her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing Surah Al-Kursi in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing Surah Yasin in a dream for a married woman? Seeing Surah Yasin in a dream for a married woman It indicates that she is a religious woman close From God. A married woman seeing Surah Yassin in a dream shows that God has blessed her with many gifts in life. A married woman seeing Surah Yassin in a dream also indicates her calm, stable and happy married life. A married woman seeing Surah Yassin in a dream announces that he has a good reputation and is loved by people. What is the interpretation of seeing Surah Yassin in a dream for a pregnant woman? A pregnant woman seeing Surah Yassin in a dream says that she will undergo an easy and affordable birth process and that she and her child will enjoy good health after the operation. A pregnant woman seeing Surah Yassin in a dream announces that she will give birth to a boy and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing a fishing rod in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing Surah Yassin in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing plaster in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing plaster in a dream: Seeing plaster in a dream is a sign of the eminence and high status of the dreamer. It is a sign of the goodness, happiness, wealth, and health enjoyed by the dreamer, his wife, and his household. Scientists have interpreted seeing a splint or splint in a dream, and this dream indicates piety, useful knowledge, and steadfastness in religion. As for the patient who dreams of a plaster in a dream, this dream is almost a sign of recovery. Seeing a plaster in a dream is a sign of pride and occupies a position. High in the field of work, as if it were high and high in the social environment. Interpretation of a dream about plaster for a married man. A married man who sees plaster in a dream, this dream is a sign of goodness and good condition for him and his family and children, as it indicates the abundance of blessings and livelihood in his home. But if The dreamer is suffering from an illness and saw plaster in a dream, so this dream indicates recovery from the disease. Seeing plaster in a dream and its interpretation. Anyone who sees plaster in a dream and suffers from poverty and poor condition, then this dream is a sign of changing clothes, changing appearance, and entering a new job. Seeing plaster on the walls in A dreamer who sees in his dream decorative plaster on the walls, and it is distinctively decorated, this is a sign of a noticeable change in the dreamer’s life, the achievement of what he desires, and a noticeable change in spaces. Of his life, whether in the field of work or in social life, but in this success it will be temporary. And whoever sees in a dream plaster on the ceiling and it falls on you and those with you, this dream is a sign that you are going through a difficult stage contaminated with many problems and difficulties that require you to confront them. Seeing the presence of a new plaster job being added to your workplace, workplace or private office, this is evidence that your efforts at work will meet with the approval of managers and you will receive huge rewards and profits as a result of the work, which will make you need people. Meaning of plaster in a dreamWho saw plaster in a dream On the lords of asceticism and piety, this dream is evidence of the dreamer’s contamination with forbidden things, abandoning the Sunnah of the Prophet, following heresies and doubts, profiting from them, and hypocrisy in religion. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations of seeing plaster in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, We take your comments at the end of the article and will give you the explanation as soon as possible.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing Sheikh Al-Shaarawi in Ibn Sirin’s dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing Sheikh Al-Shaarawi in a dream? Sheikh Muhammad Metwally Al-Shaarawi is considered one of the well-known religious scholars in the Arab and Islamic world. He was born in Dakahlia Governorate in Egypt and memorized the Holy Qur’an in his childhood. She held religious positions such as the Sheikh of Al-Azhar and important roles in many Islamic countries, but she refused to commit to the Islamic call. He is famous for his simplified style of explaining the Holy Qur’an, and this is what attracted people to him. Seeing him in a dream is one of the common visions in which people hope for good. What does it symbolize? Interpretation of seeing Sheikh Al-Shaarawi in a dream. Sheikh Al-Shaarawi in the dreamer’s dream symbolizes many positive things. It symbolizes the arrival of kindness. Patience, thinking, and good behavior with people. It also indicates good morals, a high position, safe ways, and pleasing God. It indicates the pursuit of knowledge, the pursuit of knowledge, and good deeds, and it can indicate understanding in matters of religion and renewal. If the dreamer is in the prime of life, the vision indicates To achieve goals, enjoy good health and a bright future. It denotes honest speech, commitment to truth and abandonment of falsehood. Sheikh Al-Sarawi used to say: “If you cannot tell the truth, do not applaud lies.” This is called the weakest faith. He has the ability to speak the truth, so he should be silent and not side with falsehood. The dream may indicate the dreamer’s maturity and that he is fully prepared to practice his work related to religious sciences and Islamic law. The vision symbolizes the abundance of sustenance and blessings in life. The vision of Sheikh Al-Shaarawi could serve as a warning to the pioneer to stop being arbitrarial and to stop Refrain from sins and turn to God with a satisfied and reassured spirit and repentance. If the fortuneteller sees the sheikh happy, this indicates good news of the nearness of relief, happy days, and a change in status and prestige. Seeing Sheikh Al-Shaarawi can confirm to the fortuneteller that he is on the right path and completing what he started. It also indicates Adherence to the Sunnah of the Prophet, following the guidance of the Qur’an, love for the People of the Household, and justice in this world. It indicates people of the straight path, who do not become angry with God, good company, inclination to learned gatherings, and listening to righteous and pious elders. And if the author of cognitive studies in Al-Azhar or places designated for religious learning, this indicates that the dreamer can follow the path of Sheikh Al-Shaarawi in Islamic preaching and interpretation of the Holy Qur’an. It also indicates progress in work and step by step towards the world without having in the viewer himself any connection to the world and its adornments, so he is working Mainly in order to please God and gain His love. The vision of Sheikh Al-Shaarawi in general indicates the correct approach, not deviating from the path of truth, love of people, seeking knowledge, balance between the demands of this world and religion, moderation in understanding, piety to God, and asceticism in this. International. Sheikh Al-Shaarawi in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a sheikh in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a sheikh indicates diligent work, legitimate living, striving to acquire sciences and arts, gaining experience, speaking the truth, and avoiding...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a turtle in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a turtle in a dream. It is one of the strange visions that when the dreamer sees it, he wants to know the interpretation of that vision. The interpretations and explanations of the vision differ according to the condition of the viewer, and whether he is a man or a woman. You may also be interested in meeting the sun in a dream. The appearance of a turtle in the dreamer's dream can indicate kindness and sustenance, and it can also express his religiosity and the different interpretations that we learn about today through this article, according to the opinion of Imam Ibn Sirin. Fear of a turtle in a dream It indicates that the dreamer will fall into problems and crises. Interpretation of a dream of escaping from a turtle for a single woman It indicates new changes in her life and may indicate her imminent marriage. Interpretation of a dream of a turtle in the sea indicates the high status and distinguished position of the visionary or fortune teller. Interpretation of a dream of a large green turtle It indicates calm, stability and psychological peace. You may be interested in: Shrimp and eating it in a dream Interpretation of seeing a turtle in a dream Ibn Sirin Seeing a turtle in the dreamer expresses the knowledge he learns, his closeness to God Almighty and his religion. And if he eats turtle meat in his dream, it expresses memorizing the Holy Qur’an. As for seeing the appearance of a turtle in the dreamer's dream, it indicates the huge diet that the dreamer enjoys. And being bitten The turtle for the dreamer in a dream is the knowledge from which he learns and benefits. If a turtle bite hurts him in a dream, he will benefit others and benefit them with the knowledge he brings. Feeding the turtle in the dreamer's dream indicates the good morals of the dreamer and that he helps and cares for those around him. Also, feeding the turtle for the dreamer represents his attempt to learn knowledge. Buying a turtle in a dream indicates wisdom. As for selling it, it shows that the fortune teller is negligent in what he learned. You may also be interested in: The Snake in a Dream Interpretation of seeing a turtle in a dream for singles When an unmarried girl sees a turtle walking in her dream, her vision indicates the approach of her marriage. If she sees that she is carrying a turtle in her hand, she marries someone who spends on her generously. If she sees that a turtle has bitten her in her dream, she is engaged. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that a turtle is standing at her feet, her vision portends her marriage to a religious man, with whom she is happy in her life and feels stable. And if he accepts A turtle in a dream, he hears the good news that will reach him soon. And feeding the turtle in a single dream expresses her love for science. And if she is holding a turtle in her hands, those around her care about her. And when you see a green turtle in the dream of an unmarried girl, this means that you will get money. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that a turtle is sitting on her shoulder, this means that in reality she may marry a man with power and influence. You may be interested: Distributing food in a dream Interpretation of seeing a turtle in a dream for married people The turtle in a married woman’s dream expresses many things. If she sees that she is holding a turtle in her hands, she feels the attention and love of those around her, especially her mother, and she also loves and respects them. But seeing a dead turtle in a married woman’s dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a shark in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a shark in a dream. We present to you on the Moments website everything that is new and distinctive in our article, interpretation of a dream about Ibn Shaheen’s shark, a shark in a dream. In a dream, interpretation of a dream about seeing a fish by Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fish by Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of seeing a shark in a dream. If one sees in a dream that he is eating a shark, this means that he will get a lot of money, but if he feels that shark meat has a bitter taste, this indicates However, something bad will come to him and he will be sad. title: Learn about the interpretation of clay in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Clay in a dream, seeing clay in a dream is one of the common dreams that a person sees in a dream. It has many connotations and meanings, but they differ depending on the situation of the viewer and the details of the dream, and we will talk about it in detail in this article. Clay in a dreamDreaming about making clay statues in a dream means the presence of an unstable and weak personality in reality. The interpretation of a dream about clay and a dreamer who walks with difficulty indicates that he will suffer from problems. Serious health problems in the coming days. Walking barefoot in the mud in the dreamer’s dream symbolizes a bad psychological state and depression. If one sees that he is swimming in the mud, this is evidence that he is committing great sins and walking in the path of Satan. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is removing mud, The vision indicates that positive changes will occur in her life and that she will obtain the desires she sought in the near future. If an unmarried woman sees that she is slipping in the mud, this is a sign of the arrival of a life partner who is not suitable for her engagement, and she should not rush to make a decision. Mud in a dream By Ibn Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin has proposed many interpretations of seeing clay in a dream, the most important of which are: Seeing mud in a dream indicates that the dreamer seeks to reach prestigious places and achieve overwhelming success in all aspects of life in the future. If a person sees clay pots in a dream, there is an indication that However, he wants to earn abundant money and obtain many blessings in reality. If one sees in a dream that he has fallen into the mud, he will remain sick for a long time. Seeing yourself drowning in the mud in a dream indicates that the time of death is approaching in reality. Mud in a dream for Nabulsi says Al-Nabulsi said that if a pregnant woman finds that she cannot easily walk in the mud, the birth process will be normal without the need for surgery. If a pregnant woman sees mud in her dream, this is a clear indication that she will get rid of all difficulties and crises in the coming days. Seeing him eating Clay in the dreamer’s dream symbolizes that he eats people’s rights and does not give everyone their due. The interpretation of a dream about clay mixed with plants and herbs symbolizes an abundance of blessings and benefits. Clay in a single woman’s dream Walking in the mud with difficulty in a single woman’s dream indicates that she is a dedicated and sober girl with an upright personality. It indicates the fulfillment of dreams and the achievement of goals in the near future. If an unrelated girl sees herself kneading mud in a dream, this symbolizes that she is lying to others in reality. The dream of cleaning shoes from mud in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes that she is trying in every way to make changes. In her life in general and avoid falling into humiliation. If an unmarried woman eats clay in her dream, she will get married soon and God will bless her with good offspring in the very near future. Mud in a dream for a married woman. Seeing clay in a married woman’s dream symbolizes that she will live a quiet life with her family without Problems and stress. If a woman sees her children playing in the mud, it is good

title: Interpretation of seeing chocolate in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing chocolate in a dream in detail by leading scholars in the interpretation of dreams in reality and awake, and when you see chocolate in a dream it has an interpretation and repercussions that differ from the reality that we learn based on the great Arab translators and scholars. Interpretation of a dream about seeing chocolate by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin mentioned in the dream interpretation of chocolate that it It indicates goodness and it is desirable to see it. Whoever sees in his dream that he is eating chocolate, this dream indicates that the dreamer is waiting for him with abundant nourishment without effort. As for whoever sees in his dream that he is buying chocolate, his dream indicates that he will meet a modern person and they will become friends. As for distributing chocolate In a dream, Ibn Sirin interpreted it as indicating love, warm feelings, happy occasions, and good news. Interpretation of a dream about chocolate for a single woman: Chocolate in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the approaching of a happy occasion for her, whether it is engagement or marriage. White or dark chocolate indicates emotional happiness. For her. An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she is eating delicious chocolate, her dream indicates a happy engagement or marriage with the dreamer. As for an unmarried woman who sees someone giving her chocolate as a gift, her dream indicates that she will marry that person. But if she sees a single woman In her dream that someone stole her chocolate, her dream indicates that something bad will happen to her, such as losing her lover or breaking off her engagement. Interpretation of a dream about chocolate for a married womanIf a married woman sees in her dream that someone is giving her chocolate, then her dream indicates that she is pregnant by a relative As for a married woman who sees in her dream that a dead person gives her chocolate, her dream indicates that she will own a modern home. Likewise, if a married woman sees in her dream that she is eating a lot of chocolate, then her dream is evidence of her having money as much as it is evidence of eating chocolate. In a dream.But if a married woman sees in her dream that someone stole her chocolate, then her dream symbolizes a major quarrel with her husband that will lead to her divorce.Interpretation of a dream about chocolate for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees in her dream that someone gave her a gift of chocolate, then her dream indicates On the gender of her fetus. If the chocolate is white, then her dream indicates that she will give birth to a girl. If the chocolate is black, then her dream indicates the presence of a male child. Interpretation of a dream about chocolate In general, its resolution is desirable for a pregnant woman to see in a dream, because it bodes well. But if she sees If a pregnant woman sees a dead person distributing chocolate, the dream promises her good news following her birth. Interpretation of a dream about chocolate for a man: Seeing chocolate indicates joy, pleasure, and ease of things in one’s life. Any single person who sees chocolate in a dream, this is good news for him that he will get married soon. As for a married man who Seeing chocolate being distributed to children indicates that he will have children. Also, seeing a stranger distributing chocolate indicates that he has a lot of money. A vision showed

title: What is the interpretation of seeing completely dry tea in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing dry tea in a dream. This vision is one of the visions that many people have had in a complete dream, and it is one of the visions worthy of praise. This vision may indicate a broad diet, and it may also indicate a vision of faith in God Almighty and repentance from all disobedience and sins, and God knows best. It is natural for a person to have a strange and unrealistic dream in his sleep that leads to anxiety and psychological distress, so there is no need to worry, my dear. The interpretation of seeing dry tea in a dream was completed by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that dry tea in a dream in full can indicate the best The dreamer’s circumstances in the future, and God knows best. Also, seeing green tea can indicate many diseases that afflict the fortuneteller, but they will still be close, and a lot of happiness. This vision can also indicate the death of worries and problems, and the death of misfortunes that may befall the dreamer. And it also indicates the release of the dreamer’s distress. The interpretation of seeing dry tea in a dream is complete for the ordinary woman. If a girl sees in her dream that she is buying dry tea, this indicates the collapse of her worries, success, and brilliant superiority. This vision can also indicate the marriage of the potted girl and it can indicate Also to the happiness that the girl will see with her future husband. This vision can also indicate the bad news that the dreamer faces in his life, as well as the lies that surround the girl, and God knows best. Seeing dry tea in a dream is complete for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is buying dry tea, This indicates good conditions for the woman, and indicates the collapse of marital disputes. This vision may also indicate her steadfastness in her work, great benefit for her and her children, and abundance of livelihood and money, and God knows best. Also, seeing completely dry tea in a dream can indicate good news. And bad, and it can also indicate the happiness and pleasure that the dreamer sees. The interpretation of seeing dry tea in a dream is complete for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees dry tea in her dream, this indicates the collapse of her worries, the relief of her husband’s pain, and the removal of the burdens that he is going through. This vision may also indicate the ease of her affairs. And her supervision, and the approaching date of her birth, and the disappearance of labor pains, and the birth of a child with a beautiful face. Interpretation of seeing dry tea in a dream is complete for a man. Seeing a sweet man in a dream completing the purchase of dry tea, this indicates her good transformation and interests, and God knows best. Also, seeing dry tea may indicate On his close marriage to a fair and common girl, and it may also indicate happiness and pleasure, and God knows best. Also, seeing dry, but green tea can indicate good deeds that the person will do and an abundance of food. Seeing dry tea in a dream whole may indicate good conditions For a married man, good deeds, as well as the resolution of disputes between him and his wife, and God knows best. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, write it in a comment below and a team of experts will contact you as soon as possible.

title: Learn more about the interpretations and signs of a bed appearing in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a bed in a dream: A bed in a dream is a vision that indicates many meanings and repercussions, some of which indicate good, and in other places it indicates bad things that the dreamer will be exposed to in his life. Interpretations of dreams in bed: Seeing a dream about a bed in the life of a married person, its interpretation depends on the condition of the bed itself. If the bed is clean, this is evidence of his wife’s obedience, love, and devotion to him. Seeing a sick person sleeping in bed is a sign of his approaching death. As for someone who sees an unclean, disgusting, and suspicious bed, the vision indicates that the dreamer is afflicted with an illness. For a married man to dream that the bed is broken or shattered means That the man will leave his wife during the next period of his life. A bed in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees a bed in her dream indicates the approaching date of her wedding. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that the bed is not made and that there are many things in it that hurt the eye, then her vision indicates However, the groom is not suitable for the girl. Seeing one girl in a dream with a beautiful, clean and tidy bed means that the groom is an important person and will work to make the girl happy. Interpretation of a dream about a wooden bed: Seeing a wooden bed in a married man’s dream indicates feelings of love and affection between him and his wife. Some interpreters say Seeing a wooden bed in a dream indicates the presence of hypocrites in the dreamer’s life. Sitting in the bed in a dream, he sees the dreamer returning to something that he has missed for a while or lost. What does a bed mean in a dream? An Egyptian specialized website that includes a group of leading translators of dreams and visions in the Arab world. Vision A married woman's bed in her dream indicates the extent of her husband's respect for her and his love for her. A bed in a pregnant woman's dream indicates the gender of the fetus. If the bed is beautiful and wide, this means that the fetus is female. If the bed seems narrow in a pregnant woman’s dream, this is a sign that the baby was a boy. A married man who sees himself in a dream sitting on his bed portends that his wife will become pregnant soon. What is the interpretation of seeing someone sleeping in Bed? If one sees in a dream that someone is sleeping in his bed and the dreamer is married, the vision indicates that someone will take his place. If one sees in a dream that one of his friends is sleeping in his bed, this is evidence that this person will serve as a support for the dreamer at the time Try him and he will help him get out of it safely. If the dreamer sees in a dream that one of his family members is sleeping in his bed, but he laughs loudly during his sleep, the vision indicates that there is bad news that the dreamer hears through this person. If a man sees in his dream that someone does not He knows him sleeping in his bed and the dreamer feels angry about that. The vision indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to bad things in his life during the coming period of his life, and life will change for the worse. Interpretation of the bed mattress in a dream: Seeing an unmarried young man in his dream with an elegant bed, and it was white or green, The vision indicates that he will marry a beautiful girl with good morals and religion, and she will be a good wife. If a pregnant woman sees a paper in her dream, this means that the gender of the fetus is male. If a person sees a paper in her dream, it means that the gender of the fetus is male.
